about_the_game:
"The Ghost of Anna" is a third-person adventure/puzzle game that stands out with its emotional depth. Players guide Anna, a young girl experiencing sensory anomalies and struggling through one of the most challenging times in her life. Your choices shape Anna’s story and play a decisive role in her inner journey.

Story:

Anna is trapped in her own imaginary world, facing challenges across five distinct chapters, each representing one of the senses. These chapters depict Anna’s emotional struggles through metaphorical and visual storytelling. As you explore this world, you will gain a deeper understanding of Anna’s memories and experiences. But your goal is not just to overcome obstacles or solve puzzles—it’s to touch Anna’s past and help her heal.

Gameplay:

  • Choice-Driven Narrative: Your decisions shape Anna’s journey and determine how her story unfolds.

  • Unique Puzzles: Each chapter features thematic puzzles and mechanics inspired by the senses it represents.

  • Immersive Sensory Experience: Rich audio, visual, and environmental design fully immerse you in Anna’s world.

  • Emotional Depth: Solve puzzles while sharing Anna’s emotional burden and contributing to her path toward healing.

Your Journey Awaits:

"The Ghost of Anna" aims to create a powerful emotional connection through atmospheric storytelling. It’s more than just a game; it’s a journey of empathy, discovery, and emotional healing. Guide Anna safely through her imaginary world, solve puzzles, uncover her story, and help her find her way to a happy ending—if you can.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Q6600 @ 2.40GHz / AMD Phenom 9850 @ 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 9800 GT 1GB / AMD HD 4870 1GB (DX 10, 10.1, 11)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3470 @ 3.2GHZ / AMD X8 FX-8350 @ 4GHZ
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 SUPER / Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
